title: Plat + Team Looking for a support and a jungler (Late Night Team Serious) 12 Am Est And onwards
body: This is a serious team we will do try out before we take it into ranked i expect that u get on at this time every night and if u cant notify me i would like to play a game or two every night  if u continue to miss our games then u will be kicked{{champion:17}}

replies.body: Try me out. Support Main. IGN: McQuack
im a bronze with plat skills
